member.summary: The for the error.

member.name: F:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.GeolocationPositionErrorCode.DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Geolocation failoed because the device does not support geolocation. Not part of W3C spec.

member.name: F:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.GeolocationPositionErrorCode.PERMISSION_DENIED
member.summary: Geolocation failed because permission to access location was denied.

member.name: F:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.GeolocationPositionErrorCode.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE
member.summary: Geolocation failed because of an internal error on the device.

member.name: F:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.GeolocationPositionErrorCode.TIMEOUT
member.summary: Geolocation failed because no position was returned in time.

member.summary: A wrapper around the function, used to get the current position of the device.
member.returns: The result of the geolocation request.

member.name: M:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.IGeolocationService.WatchPosition(Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.PositionOptions)
member.summary: A wrapper around the function, used to listen for position changes. If the service is listening, a event is fired each time the device's position changes.
member.returns: A watch ID that refers to the handler. The ID can be used to unregister the handler with .

member.name: E:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.IGeolocationService.WatchPositionReceived
member.summary: Handles the receipt of new positions. Fired whenever a handler is registered and the device's position changes. Invoked with the sender and the .

member.name: M:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.IGeolocationService.ClearWatch(System.Int64)
member.summary: A wrapper around the function, used to unregister a handler created with .
member.param: The ID of the registered watch handler.
member.returns: A task that represents the async clear operation.

member.name: T:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.PositionOptions
member.summary: Option properties to be passed to Geolocation functions, based on https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/PositionOptions.

member.name: P:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.PositionOptions.EnableHighAccuracy
member.summary: Enable high accuracy mode for best possible results. May be slower or increase power consumption. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.PositionOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Maximum length of time allowed to return a position (in milliseconds). Set to null for no timeout. Defaults to null.

member.name: P:Darnton.Blazor.DeviceInterop.Geolocation.PositionOptions.MaximumAge
member.summary: Maximum allowed age for a cached result. Set to null to disregard the age of cached results. Set to 0 to skip the cache and attempt a fresh result every time. Defaults to 0.
